title: Life Skills Development Through Physical Education: Project-Based Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Targeting novice professionals (medical/legal/technical), this course aims to develop practical skills applicable to real life—such as teamwork, communication, and problem-solving—through physical activities. Digital devices enable data analysis and collaboration tools

learning_goals: Learners can execute effective teamwork during collaborative problem-solving in physical education activities.
Learners can concretely explain self-regulation and stress-management strategies through physical activity performance.
Learners can apply life skills acquired in physical education settings to real-world job scenarios through project-based assessment tasks.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
